com.codename1.rad.models

Class WidgetDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codename1.rad.models.WidgetDescriptor

  • public class WidgetDescriptor
extends Object

    A special class that provides configuration for a "widget" which is used to edit a Property in the EntityEditor.

    Author:
    shannah
    See Also:
    EntityType#widget(com.codename1.rad.models.Attribute…​), com.codename1.rad.ui.UI#widget(com.codename1.rad.models.Attribute…​)
